item.title: pong with points
item.description: 14:11 Thursday 23 April 2015 JST I made a version of pong with points. Next plans are to add a little delay after all balls are lost, add some audio, an options screen to turn off audio, an AI to allow single player mode.

item.title: pong demo
item.description: 12:53 Saturday 18 April 2015 JST My pong demo now spawns the ball in a random direction each time it spawns, and spawns a new ball when the existing ball exits the game area. I don’t have internet access atm, but I think this URL will let you play pong without scores.
